name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live ＂STELLAR into the GALAXY＂ Supported By Bushiroad [LtqzI9y5yII]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Voice-over announcement over the concert logo, officially starting the show.
Opening introduction video featuring stylized cityscapes and visual effects.
Cinematic interlude with narration by Suisei, showing scenes of a city.

subtitles.original: あらためまして、
subtitles.english: Once again,

subtitles.original: 星街すいせいファーストソロライブ、
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live,

subtitles.original: “STELLAR into the GALAXY”
subtitles.english: “STELLAR into the GALAXY”

subtitles.original: Supported By Bushiroad、
subtitles.english: Supported By Bushiroad,

subtitles.original: 開演します！
subtitles.english: will now begin!

subtitles.original: スタート！
subtitles.english: Start!

subtitles.original: 誰もが、この街で孤独だった。
subtitles.english: Everyone was lonely in this city.

subtitles.original: 道行く人々はすれ違い、
subtitles.english: People pass each other on the streets,

subtitles.original: 思い描く未来も霞がかっている。
subtitles.english: and the future they imagine is clouded.

subtitles.original: 空で輝いているはずの星は、
subtitles.english: The stars that should be shining in the sky

subtitles.original: 雲に覆われて見えない。
subtitles.english: are covered by clouds and cannot be seen.

subtitles.original: そして僕は、
subtitles.english: And I,

subtitles.original: 今日も何者にもなれないでいる。
subtitles.english: still haven't become anyone today.

subtitles.original: アッとはじけた感情に
subtitles.english: At my suddenly burst emotions,

subtitles.original: 言い訳を並べて過ごした
subtitles.english: I spent my time lining up excuses.

subtitles.original: 葛藤も知らない街明かり
subtitles.english: The city lights that know no conflict,

subtitles.original: 君だけだった、そう見えた
subtitles.english: it was only you, or so it seemed.

subtitles.original: 信じたくもないままで、踊っている
subtitles.english: Without even wanting to believe, I'm dancing.

subtitles.original: 示し合わずに、連ね続けた言葉
subtitles.english: Without any sign, words kept on following.

subtitles.original: 見えないの？僕が
subtitles.english: Can't you see me?

subtitles.original: 僕のこの声が聞こえてる？
subtitles.english: Can you hear this voice of mine?

subtitles.original: 断罪したシルエットすらも
subtitles.english: Even the condemned silhouette

subtitles.original: 透明できっと、不格好だけど
subtitles.english: is transparent and surely awkward, but

subtitles.original: でも、せめて声を枯らそう
subtitles.english: at least, I'll scream my voice out.

subtitles.original: 必死にすがってもずっと照明を
subtitles.english: Even if I cling desperately, always

subtitles.original: 焦がすほどみたいだ
subtitles.english: it seems like it's burning the lights.

subtitles.original: 散々恨んだ明るさと
subtitles.english: With the brightness I hated so much,

subtitles.original: 意味ありげに伸びてゆく影
subtitles.english: and the shadows stretching out meaningfully.

subtitles.original: 淡々と過ぎたひとつぶの
subtitles.english: A single drop passed indifferently,

subtitles.original: 君の言葉で歩きたくなった
subtitles.english: your words made me want to walk.

subtitles.original: 大切にしたいものが、こぼれてゆく
subtitles.english: Things I want to cherish are spilling away.

subtitles.original: 示し様に、綴り続けたい言葉
subtitles.english: In a way to show, words I want to keep writing.

subtitles.original: 見えてるの？僕が
subtitles.english: Can you see me?

subtitles.original: 僕のこの声が届いてる？
subtitles.english: Is this voice of mine reaching you?

subtitles.original: 断罪したシルエットすらも
subtitles.english: Even the condemned silhouette...
